manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What are the benefits of busy boards? The busy board develops sensory learning through colors, shapes, textures, and numbers and improves hand-eye coordination. Sensory board promotes early childhood development like cognitive growth, language development, fine motor skills, and gross motor skills.Busy book encourages social interactions and problem-solving skills.A busy board for toddlers, also known as a Montessori busy board, making it a fabulous introduction for a toddler into the art of tinkering, which brings so many short-term and long-term benefits.It's a very major benefit of Montessori toys that provide children with learning while playing. One great thing about this learning is that children learn and correct their mistakes on their own. In this environment, children learn to explore things and do practical things to enhance their abilities.
Montessori busy board for toddlers are exciting, interactive, and encourage children to explore their curiosity through experimentation.

Thanks to the preschool learning activities zip string toy lightweight and compact design, easily put it in the backpack and take it anywhere. Q&A: 1.Is sensory toys good for autism/ADHD? Sensory activities for autism are effective learning tools that engage all areas of a child's brain, helping them with their cognitive, emotional, physical, social and communication development. For autistic/ADHD children, engaging in sensory play can retrain the brain's response to sensory information, the Montessori environment can be a relief. 2.What is the best age for sensory board? Sensory Busy Board or Learning Board. Sensory busy board is a type of a kids activity board that is mainly used for the children who are from 1 – 5 years old for the development of their sensations, tactile skills and fine motor skills.(They is looking for activities that stimulate his senses.They want to master practical abilities, for which they’re naturally inclined.) 3.Why are Montessori toys so popular? Montessori busy boards are perfect for helping in childhood sensory development because they are exciting, interactive, and encourage children to explore their curiosity through experimentation and these are the skills that will help them go about their day successfully.

Warm Tips: 1. As there are some small parts in the busy board, we suggest children under the age of three play this busy board under the supervision of parents. 2. This busy board should be cleaned with a wet cloth, then placed in a ventilated place to dry out (no machine wash). 3.Please tie two knots on both ends of the rope to prevent the small parts from falling off after receiving the toy. 4.We suggest parents to play busy board with kids a few days after receiving it. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great toy
reviews.reviewText: It is educational well made and fun for toddlers. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Educational Toy for Toddler
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item as a gift for a 4 year old boy's birthday. It's very educational, and the variety of activities keeps him from getting bored. And he loves having it in the car when they travel. Extra pieces come in the kit just in case some get lost. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toy for airplane travel
reviews.reviewText: I was desperate to find a few toys for my toddler (21 months) to have fun with on a 6-7 hour flight, round trip, and this busy board beat alllllll the other gadgets I got. There is so much to do in this busy board and it is made impressively well. Matching shapes, color stuff, locks, keys, shoe laces, animals, emotions…. IT HAS EVERYTHING. My KID LOVED IT. And she has so much more to grow to love with it (like she is great at shape stuff, learning colors and yet to learn shoe laces and locks…). This is perfect for travel!!!! So glad I got it + wish i didn’t waste money on plastic reusable sticker books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase!
reviews.reviewText: This book is awesome! My son (17 months) loves it and plays with it everyday. It's got a lot of useful learning materials and keeps him busy (and quiet😆) For a good amount of time! He does like to throw the small pieces around but that give another learning opportunity for cleaning up!The only thing I would say needs to be upgraded is the velcro pieces. They aren't sticky enough and keep coming off of the book and the small pieces and need to be re-applied. We are just going to buy some better quality velcro and swap it out. Otherwise it's a great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great toy to keep little ones busy on long car rides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my kids to have in the car especially for long distances. It looks nice but I was amazed that I had tonpersonaly put the velcro pieces on and some of the velcro pieces didn't want to stick and had to be super glued.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grand daughter reaches for this toy often.
reviews.reviewText: 16 month old likes this toy and spends a good amount of time investigating the little gears and gadgets. She is happy when she figures one out. My only regret is that I didn’t purchase a more extensive busy board.I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Be prepared to assemble for days
reviews.reviewText: Not gonna lie, I was not expecting this much assembly (like seriously hundreds of pieces) and it feels cheap. Well…it guess it actually was so that’s on me but I would not buy this again. The Velcro is not strong enough for the pieces to stick good. A light shake and everything falls out. I tried putting more than one Velcro dot on the back of some pieces and it didn’t make a difference. My niece is at the low end of the age range for this and even though the tasks are great for her development, this is just not executed very well. Boo
